title: Clinical Laboratory Scientist Interview
Interview Descriptions: The process was done very smoothly by inviting all of us to the branch office in Bolgatanga in the Upper East Region of Ghana. Interview was conducted in a very friendly atmosphere such that I could express my value that I could add to the company.
Interview Questions: What practical solution did you proffer for your formation organization giving an example of the situation?

title: Finance Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Millennium Promise (New York, NY) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: was called, did a phone interview, then met with CFO and program manager and CEO. The CFO had to give the final word as he would be my direct hire. Overall the interview was easy
Interview Questions: your experience in sub saharan africa

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Millennium Promise
Interview Questions: are you going to stick in west africa for long?
